comments: A great app to download. Great format and graphics. Lots of fun and challenging. Rated everything 5 star other than gameplay. It's good but not great due to the water hazard or out of bounds shots.  Players can hit into the water yet still finish on par. Water hazard should automatically be 2 shots. If this gets changed it would be 5 star no doubt and best golf app.  Single mode would be fantastic to practise

OK I really love this game but all if a sudden I can't play it anymore. I try to set up a match and it just hangs in the loading screen then boots me to the main menu. I have sent 2 emails to support within almost a week and more than 48 hours apart. I have not received any responses. Other than that it is a great game and for the time I was able to play I enjoyed it very much and hope to receive assistance in this matter soon so I can continue to play this wonderful game.

I had to change my rating for this game because I seriously believe it is rigged for me to stop advancing. Everything was great until I made it to pro level and now I'm noticing that whenever I am tied with another player with gems, an extra gem magically appears in the hole making me lose that round. How is it possible that I made it to pro level winning a good percentage of games and now I have played at least 50 rounds on level 3 and can't win a single one?

To many play just to attack your ball after you hit. Regardless if they don't play well they win. A bit eh. The way it's done barely allows you to win. I agree with many others reviews. Something fishy about the scoring system and who you are placed against. Won't keep long if it continues. Could be awesome if it wasn't unfair. O.o

This game is ok at best. More about luck then skill. Fun and addictive, yes at times. Ive collected all the trophies from 3 of the maps and was on a roll. Then out of nowhere a 15 game lose streak. You will get to the point past anger. There are a lot of pretty good/lucky players from around the world.

Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.  EDIT: Game froze on a Pixel XL, cost me lots of coins! Not happy.
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★KEY FEATURES - Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer. - Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike! - Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies! - Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun. - Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves! - Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top. - Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus. - Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion! - Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge! - Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts! - Play online matches with your family and friends!* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news! https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/* You need an internet connection to play this game.* Optional Permissions - Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.  - Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.  - Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches* How to turn permissions on or off - Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off. - Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.
descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!

Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!

So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

KEY FEATURES
- Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer.
- Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike!
- Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies!
- Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun.
- Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves!
- Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top.
- Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus.
- Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion!
- Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge!
- Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts!
- Play online matches with your family and friends!

* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news!
https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/

* You need an internet connection to play this game.

* Optional Permissions
- Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.
- Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.
- Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches

* How to turn permissions on or off
- Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). Tap "Mini Golf King". Tap "Permissions". Move switches to the right or the left to turn the permissions on or off.
- Android OS earlier than 6.0: You need to upgrade the OS to control each permission. Otherwise you may uninstall "Mini Golf King" app to revoke them as a whole.

comments: Great game. But, if this is the app causing ads to randomly open when using literally anything else on my phone, I'd like a reply asap because I will uninstall it and it's frustrating. If not then I will keep and rewrite my review.
What's with the forced advertisements? They make the game painful to play. This should be a 5 star review but your new 'feature' ruins it.
Fly the coolest thing in the world. Really could do with fast earned money. Like maybedaily challenges that ACTUALLY gives you boatloads of money! other than that the game is awesome

Great game but unfortunately it doesn't save game progress I had all gadgets vehicles also in gold quite a few expensive jet packs, now I changed my phone n lost all of it, but the jetpack joy ride team reached out to me by email, I think it was great, although I can get my record back there willing to help me out with my gadgets and stuff, quick response great game!

Everytime you die an ADS starts and make the game very slow...I was used to play this game in the past.It become much better after all these years in the gameplay but the FORCED ads ruined it. Too slow now
Needs less ads u get an ad whenever u lose whether u like it or not that mildly bugs me and I hate things that mildly bug me plz fix Half Brick Dudes

comments: I absolutely love this game. The music is good, the challenges are really fun and... well, challenging. It has taken me several days of being asked by the game if I would like to review it because I was having so much fun and didn't want to stop playing long enough to review. But here you have it. This game is well deserving of a great review. I'm going to go back to the game now so I can keep on rushing.

Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..😉😉 I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...😂😂 Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. 😘😘😘❤️❤️❤️

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.

Minus another star because it's now glitchy and no longer gives daily bonus. I'm on challenge 89 and the point accumulation is taking forever. Minus one star because the ad at the bottom gets in the way while playing. I'll be on a good run and barely graze the ad space and it stops the game and ends the run. Very frustrating.

I'm obsessed with this game. It's not just playing to beat your best score. There are challenges that you can beat as you play and it makes it okay to have a bad run sometimes because you can still beat the challenge lol. Not frustrating, just so much fun. Not sure if my review makes sense, just play this game ok.

comments: Wow! Just WOW! I had been very skeptical about downloading this huge gigabyte and pay-to-win game, BUT after finally "trying it out to see" I am now hooked and now a believer of all of the hype! I have gotten pretty far so far and have a pretty decent crew and I have not had to pay a red cent at all. The grinding in this game is actually fun and I do not mind watching an ad or two for fuel. Simple concept, EXCELLENT execution!

Wow, I'm extremely impressed. The gameplay is very fluid (as it runs on a 60fps on my s9+) lagging and unrealism is unheard of. Also, the soundtrack throughout the games retains just as much excitement as you'll feel beginning the game, viewing car selecting and racing. A must have game for car/racing/gaming enthusiast's. Very additcting.

Ok, my game is back but I'm missing a lamborghini 700-4 that was decked out completely with fusion parts maxed out and stage 6 nitrous and tires. So, you owe me a what, 4 start or 5 star car decked as my car was you took from me. I bought crates with money real money for that car. So I want the closest thing to my car the same as it was. Thank u

I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Sound could use tweaking, I've driven some of the t1 and t2 cars and they do not sound like that. The grind is real in this game but the developer adds events on a frequent basis to over shadow this. Which would be great if the events didn't expect you to either have the devils luck with silver key crates or a never ending supply of cash.   Over all, great game. I still enjoy playing it even when I hit a "pay wall" and that says something about the game. I've only put $5 into this game (bought a $4.99 special pack) and I've still made it pretty far.

This is by far the greatest racing game I've played on a mobile device! The graphics are amazing, the controls are solid, and it keeps me coming back for more. The only issue I've found with it so far is the live races. Its sometimes hard to find a race and the races themselves seem unfair at times. Other than that, its a great game! Highly recommended!

descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy

Great way to relax or calm down. Lots of choices without having to earn game coin to buy more that only disappoint. Mix of both easy and challenging. One thing would improve over all play and that would be an easy way to locate any missed cells at the end of a puzzle. Having to scroll through some of those detailed ones to find one or two blanks can be a real headache! Other than than i think this is the best color game I have tried! Keep up the great work!!

comments: Nice game but the random number generator is non existent. Hold three numbers and roll again, even with free or earned additional rolls, are ALWAYS the same number that was there! This would fail state regulations on gambling games. Fun but a sucker game for rolling anything that counts as statistically random

This is fun, IF you can figure it out. I like playing yahtzee but this is complicated. Every time I get extra dice, the ???? spends them or takes them away from me so I don't get to spend them the way I want to. That sucks.

Love the game! But recently did an update for the app now my game glitches out. Takes forever to roll the dice. Only updated the app cuz it said they fixed bugs & made faster well it did the opposite for my app.

Showdown is a joke!  100% guarantee opponent will get a double Yahtzee every single game.  Their average score is 320+ when a normal person scores 250-275.  Impossible enough to score a Yahtzee yourself but double is almost unheard of.

Playing verse your friends is fun but Playing against the computer is not fun but a complete waste of time. Only way to Win is to Extra rolls with the Dice you have to buy. If you don't plan on losing 2/3 of the time.
The game was awesome until the ads started to pop up every 5 seconds, and the game progressively got slower and slower. Now it's just ads upon ads and lag. Game got ruined quick.

description: The addictive mega-hit Temple Run is now out for Android! All your friends are playing it - can you beat their high scores?!You've stolen the cursed idol from the temple, and now you have to run for your life to escape the Evil Demon Monkeys nipping at your heels. Test your reflexes as you race down ancient temple walls and along sheer cliffs. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, collect coins and buy power ups, unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! "In every treasure hunting adventure movie there’s one scene in which the plucky hero finally gets his hands on the treasure but then has to navigate a maze of booby traps in order to get out alive. Temple Run is this scene and nothing else. And it’s amazing." - SlideToPlay.comREVIEWS★ "Most thrilling and fun running game in a while, possibly ever." - TheAppera.com★ "A fast and frenzied experience." - IGN.com★ "Very addicting… definitely a very different running game." - Appolicious.com★ Voted by TouchArcade Forums as Game of the Week★ One of TouchArcade's Best Games of the Month★ Over 50 MILLION players worldwide!

comments: Simple design with good possibilities, but several of the adds pop up and tell me there is a virus on my brand new phone and it can not be closed out.  The internet browser has to be shut down to close it.  Has potential for fun, but too much time wasted trying to close false adds.

I really like this game because 1, it is funny, a sausage running through a kitchen dodging all these obstacles, you have to admit that is kinda funny, 2nd I like how you can unlock so many different sausage skins, who would have thought that there would be so many different kinds of sausage, and finally, 3rd, I also like how you can play with other people, you can play with other people because you can take turns, when one person dies in the game it's the next persons turn. This game is awesome and all about tactics, and I love it. This game deserves a five star!🖒

The game it's self isn't bad but it's also nothing new. It's just a copy off of different idea's but that does't really matter. What matters is that there's a constant redirect ever 30 seconds! It sends you to a website and it's often and very stupid... And if a redirect isn't bad enough it no joke happens to me in the middle of game play. You can be playing and all the sudden here comes a redirect... !
This game is extremely glitchy. Also I see great time killer on EVERY APP! Are the developers doing this? I don't know but, that doesn't take away the fact that it's SUPER LAGGY!

Loved the game, but every minute or so the game will minimise and chrome will open to some page in poor English saying "you have 4 virus!! Etc, etc." Not even sure if its this developer's fault or not,  but the game is unplayable because of that spam ad...

descriptionHTML:
Run, Sausage, run!
Hot diggity dog, that’s a fine lookin’ hot dog!
You never sausage a sausage! (Get it? Saw such… sausage? Anyone?)

Stop punning and start running! This adventure run is a hot dog’s dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.

Play as the tasty sausage of your choice. Weisswurst or blutwurst, bacon or chocolate… even plumber or cowboy!

Run for your life through an endless path as you flex that hot-dog body and avoid getting sliced, chopped, burned or smashed in this adventure run game!

Tons of juicy sausages to choose from, tons of hot dog skins to enjoy in this adventure run.

Collect coins as you run for your sweet (or spicy) life to buy buns of steel and other cool powerups in this adventure run game.

Build all kinds of fields, stables or production buildings and decorate your farm with stunning decorations. description: Word Chef is a new type of the classic word search, scrabble word finder puzzle game. In this game, you are the chef, your duty is to find the right formulas to make great disks. There are many types of disks such as: ice cream, cake, seafood, salad, national disk, drinks. So challenge yourself and become the master chef ever. How to play: - Swipe to connect letters and build a valid word. - Fill out all the letter boxes with words.When you get stuck at a difficult level:- Use "Shuffle" function to shuffle letters, then perhaps you find it easier to recognize the valid word.- Use "Hint" function to open a letter in letter box.- Take screenshot and ask your friends. You can also share the game with your friends then you and them can play this fantastic game together.We take pride in saying that Word Chef Search Puzzles is the best word search game for Android. The themes are what makes this app interesting, instead of auto generated word search levels. You can spend countless hours finding words! It's perfect with your daily cup of coffee.Game feature:• 540 well-made levels.• Beautiful HD graphics• Beautiful Background• Sweet animations• Many challenging levels• Easy & fun to play, challenging to master
descriptionHTML:
Word Chef is a new type of the classic word search, scrabble word finder puzzle game. In this game, you are the chef, your duty is to find the right formulas to make great disks.
There are many types of disks such as: ice cream, cake, seafood, salad, national disk, drinks. So challenge yourself and become the master chef ever.

How to play:
- Swipe to connect letters and build a valid word.
- Fill out all the letter boxes with words.

When you get stuck at a difficult level:
- Use "Shuffle" function to shuffle letters, then perhaps you find it easier to recognize the valid word.
- Use "Hint" function to open a letter in letter box.
- Take screenshot and ask your friends. You can also share the game with your friends then you and them can play this fantastic game together.

We take pride in saying that Word Chef Search Puzzles is the best word search game for Android. The themes are what makes this app interesting, instead of auto generated word search levels. You can spend countless hours finding words! It's perfect with your daily cup of coffee.

Game feature:
• 540 well-made levels.
• Beautiful HD graphics
• Beautiful Background
• Sweet animations
• Many challenging levels
• Easy & fun to play, challenging to master

comments: Games are great and always challenging although I cannot believe that top place persons can make 3 selections per second and analyze each move.   Update: the more I play this app the more I am sure these top people cannot be making that number of moves in one second. It takes at least a second to view any new cards and decide your moves. I believe a computer is actually playing for them. These top numbers are not realistic! I still enjoy the game but makes me feel really inferior.

The program is good and I actually use it for a medical use. I believe it would be more fun if you had or offered levels of difficulty. Such as a person can choose a level 1 or another level such as 3. Each becoming more difficult. This would intrigue me more and possibly encourage me to pay for the app. Is this feature available? I would really enjoy the challenge.

Just love the challenge of completing the cards. Great customization, tracks your best score and compares against others playing. Would be nice if you could replay a Winning Deal immediately after not 've finished it, if you want to try and improve your score. If you can replay them, I haven't found how to do it. But that's a small thing. Just love solitaire in general, but this app specifically. Had it for a couple years now. Love it!!  3/1/2018 - Follow up. This app has now used over 4 GB of data for February. I had 6 GB plus and I got the notice from T-Mobile that I have 1 GB left. Checked my data usage and solitaire showed to use 4.3 GB for month. What the bleep is going on? I love this game, but not at the expense of all my data. Hopefully that's a bug. If not i ve got to uninstall. Please tell me that's a bug.

Too many ads. I was okay with it at first, the breaking point was when they started playing the audio for an ad in the middle of a game with no warning or screen flash and no way to cancel it. They just started playing noise through my phone's speakers. There are other solitaire games out there, don't waste your time on this one.

Used to love this game but recently the Ads have become so personalised it seems like they are accessing my phone's data. The last ad referenced one of the companies I'd previously worked for. As a result I've sadly uninstalled this app.

One of the best solitaire games I've found.  You can change the layout for left hand, tap to play a card, and the hint icon will tell you when there are no more USEFUL plays.  I tried a couple of others, but deleted them.  Easiest to play.

comments: What a good little game. Nothing special in the graphics department but it delivers on everything it says and shows. After playing for a little while I couldn't help but feel like I was waiting for a little bald guy to want to eat me if I got an answer wrong, "cans we eats it precious". Jokes and riddles. Very good game. Well done.

Game is really good specially for kids . Makes them think. Only bad part of this game is the list in answers.. they are already displayed. This makes the game very easy. It would make an awesome game if user had to enter the answers.. hope the developers fix this!

Way TOO MANY adds. It's more a front end for advertising & the questions are way to simple to the point of being inane. Mildly entertaining if you like to feel smart but only a diversion for a matter of minutes. Personally I much rather apps where for a payment you can remove the adds but this isn't one!

Great gane, it's got good riddles, but level 3 is a little messed up. It has repeated riddles, riddles with multiple answers (what time is it) and some that are two easy. If you could go over that level and maybe go through a couple others/the rest, that would be nice. Great game overall though!

It's good for passing time, however, I would say these are jokes, more than they are riddles.   It's very annoying that when completing a level, the menu starts right at the top and you have to scroll down to the next level, so once you get passed level 20, it's quite irritating.  As others have said it's a very easy game but it is good. Just needs minor improvements.

I found "500 Riddles" to be somewhat misleading.  After the first few levels the riddles started to repeat. (Either the exact same riddle or the same riddle worded differently) Also grammar and punctuation errors in the riddles started to get annoying. But overall I did enjoy the program.

comments: Great start! No glitches. Performs smoothly! One of the best games on Android!! Must download Belive me I have never spent a single penny of "real" money and the game has never been unfair to me. Its really very good game. They found a sweet spot to balance both paid and free players. You just need to go on playing. I got the costliest robot of the market for free. Keep playing you'll eventually be strong enough and then you'll never stop to play.

I really hated this game at first, when i was trying it on a friend's phone. It has really grown on me since then, i love it. I've been playing it for years now and still love it; the graphics are amazing, the game play is smooth, my clan is great, there's always new stuff to do or new bots/weapons to acquire. Yes, there are some people playing that kinda ruin a battle for your team but Hey, it's just a game and you still get points if you lose. Do your best and have fun.

After being so long on the game I can see that the development team behind this game is pretty committed. I can see they really put effort into debugging, improving and renewing some elements of the game, I've decided to increase the star counts for War Robots (This is the original one). It's one heck of a game for mobile device I can tell you that. As for attaining the "best robots" or the "best weapons" in the game, it's hard but it's not impossible.  Just take part in the festive events... and you don't neccessarily need the "best bots" to annihilate your opponents...

Supposed random game is not random. You only win the lowest prices until you start spending gold.  Black market is the same. Also it will take you a decade before you get the best robots unless you shell out your hard earned money. I hope the drop off scheme would earn me points, however it's just for one type of robot.

This game is very much Pay to Win. So expect some people to crush you.  All the "gambling" games are fixed to make sure you get the lowest possible reward. Don't waste your gold gambling. All that said this game is worth 5 stars just for the gameplay. The graphics are amazing and the game is fun even when you end up against someone spending hundreds of real dollars on robots and gear. Be patient. You may not always win or do well but in time you can give all but the most hardcore spenders a run for their money (all pun intended)

It will be cool if we can upgrade not  just one robot but all!! And pls double the gold I rlly need it right now for just 1 orkan And also why is it so hard to get a weapons like with puzzle logo on it it's like 10,000 can you imagine that! If I made the game I would do just 6,000 or 5,000! One more make a single player like player vs AI and it will say easy medium hard
description: War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors! What will you choose?– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. descriptionHTML:

Now it's time to get back at that noose-wielding bully!

This game is actually good. The biggest downside is that there's A LOT OF ADVERTISEMENT to watch during playing. I know this is a free game, but c'mon! Waiting and watching minutes of the advertisement is longer than playing the game itself. Not to mention the conversation between characters in the game also took too long to wait and there's some things need to use real money before it can be explored.  This kind of game supposed to be fun and gives the cha cha feeling, but instead I get frustrated of waiting for the advertisement to finish before I can continue playing.  Out of all that, this game is great.

description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  • WORLDWIDE and local.  • unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  • Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  • Up to 8 players in one game.  • Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! • Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  • Up to 4 Players in one game.  • Chat is available as well! • 8 special maps. • Hardcore gameplay.  • Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  • A new training camp for first-timers.  • More detailed graphics.• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. • Cool new songs• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  • Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  • A lot of absolutely different maps.  • Many types of zombies and enemies.  • Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  • Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  • Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ——————————————————————————————————This is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

——————————————————————————————————
This is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.

description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.>Highlights:Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

comments: It's nice game - very nice graphic, very smooth moving - it would be 5 stars. BUT - I payed for levels 13 and 14 , and the game does not allow me to play in random order - it's not possible to play no. 23 without finishing all numbers before. If you are stuck in some number, you cannot go to another one - you MUST BUY hint!!! It means - you PAID for the game, but you MUST PAY again for hint - or you are blocked in PAID  game. It's just not fair.

A lot of Numberlink programs have "fake" puzzles - they have multiple solutions unless additional non-standard "rules" are followed... which are NEVER fun. This app doesn't do that. These are the real deal, and are VERY satisfying to solve. The price is extremely low for the quantity and quality on offer; I highly recommend this game.

I loved flow free from a young age. I've played until 9×9 pack but when I reached a certain level,  the game stopped working after that and I've tried over and over again to go in but the game just keeps bring me back to the home screen and keeps stopping. Please fix it. I really want to play the remaining levels and packs

Great game. Keep coming back to it. I find it relaxing solving the puzzles, though it has become super easy! All versions are great. All in all, awesome job! One of my favourites, and works in any situation. Quick break at work, something productive ? Play. Something to do before sleep? Play. Got a few extra mins? Play! Wanna challenge yourself on timed? Play! Haha.

The best, the OG, the original puzzle time-passer! (second only to Tetris) I love this game, I've been playing it for years! The original starts to get boring after awhile, but with all the different variations they come out with, it never gets old. A very fresh experience with one of the recent updates, feels much more refined when compared to the one I used to play.

Simple yet clever, Free Flow is about connecting brightly colored dots together without crossing the lines. With an abundance of board shape, size, variety, and difficulty, there's something in free play to challenge nearly everybody. Those who find even the largest puzzles too easy may alternatively challenge themselves in time trials to finish the boards as quickly as possible.
description: Flow Free® is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow®. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Flow Free. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Flow Free gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free a try, and experience "mind like water"!Flow Free features:★ Over 2,000 free puzzles★ Free Play and Time Trial modes★ Clean, colorful graphics★ Fun sound effectsSpecial thanks to Noodlecake Studios, creators of Super Stickman Golf, for their work on Flow Free!Enjoy.
descriptionHTML:

description: Ever wanted to be Mayor? Ever wanted to run a town, develop the land, and see a metropolis grow? Well, look no further than Merge Town!, the newest title from Gram Games. The concept of the game is simple - you have a plot of land, and it’s your job to turn it into a town. Every so often, you’ll be gifted with a house. Each house can be merged with other houses of the same variety to form a bigger home. Every house built on the land will earn you money - the bigger the home, the more you will earn. The more you earn, the more houses you can purchase, and the more you can push the clock to develop faster. Use your spoils to discover new homes, and to expand into all new towns.You have a singular goal: make your towns the best they can be. The bar at the top of the screen measures development - Merge buildings to earn XP and level up. Higher levels will unlock more space in your plot for you to develop, which will only allow you to develop your town to even further greatness. Once you develop into new towns, keep an eye on all your land, ensuring that you’re merging and developing to your full potential.Merge, build, and develop your very own towns with Merge Town!
descriptionHTML:
Ever wanted to be Mayor? Ever wanted to run a town, develop the land, and see a metropolis grow? Well, look no further than Merge Town!, the newest title from Gram Games. The concept of the game is simple - you have a plot of land, and it’s your job to turn it into a town. Every so often, you’ll be gifted with a house. Each house can be merged with other houses of the same variety to form a bigger home. Every house built on the land will earn you money - the bigger the home, the more you will earn. The more you earn, the more houses you can purchase, and the more you can push the clock to develop faster. Use your spoils to discover new homes, and to expand into all new towns.

You have a singular goal: make your towns the best they can be. The bar at the top of the screen measures development - Merge buildings to earn XP and level up. Higher levels will unlock more space in your plot for you to develop, which will only allow you to develop your town to even further greatness. Once you develop into new towns, keep an eye on all your land, ensuring that you’re merging and developing to your full potential.

Merge, build, and develop your very own towns with Merge Town!

comments: Like it a lot so far.
Really makes your brain work. I am enjoying it.
Nice

Good and love the puzzles but the maths one in blue ruins it for me. All other puzzle improve your skills but this isn't since you have no time to caulate the expression it's more a test of memory then calculation because you can only 3 star it if you know the expression by heart if you try workout you answer right but run out of time. You should make is so each correct answer adds time so you can accurately l improve. Also most games are broken with not enough time to do the given task and workout same as previous has no buttons so you can't play it.

The puzzles are simple yet challenging, and there's enough of them to keep your interest for a long time. Star ratings give the game good replay value, and the workout mode is a nice addition for something short and sweet. Ads can get a bit annoying, but there's not too many and the pro version isn't that expensive anyway. As for the skill-building element, I can definitely see a difference in my attention and reflexes since playing. Overall, I would definitely recommend this game.

The image vortex game does not work. Is it intentional to make us skip the level by making purchases? Coz it doesn't work at all, atleast on my redmi phone. If all the images come at once it's impossible to pick the one appearing last. Have to remove the app though I was enjoying it so far

description: In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!• A detailed damage system.THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play. So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!__HOT WHEELS and associated trademarks and trade dress are owned by, and used under license from, Mattel. ©2017 Mattel. descriptionHTML:
In Asphalt 8, you’ll race in some of the hottest, most high-performance dream machines ever created, from cars to bikes, taking them on a global tour of speed. From the blazing Nevada Desert to the tight turns of Tokyo, you’ll find a world of challenge, excitement & arcade fun on your road to the top!

REAL LUXURY DREAM CARS & MOTORCYCLES!
• Over 190 high-performance cars & bikes to drive & push beyond their limits.
• Top licensed manufacturers & models: the Lamborghini Veneno, Bugatti 16.4 Grand Sport Vitesse, Ferrari LaFerrari, McLaren P1, Porsche 911 GT3 RS, Ducati Monster 1200 & more, including a selection of racing motorbikes!
• Newly recorded high-fidelity motor sounds for realistic audio immersion.
• Customize & upgrade your rides with over 2,300 decals to take down opponents with style!

GET AIRBORNE WITH ASPHALT 8
• Hit the ramps & take the race beyond the limits of physics, breaking free from gravity into the sky with a car or bike!
• Perform barrel rolls & wild 360º jumps to soar past your opponents.
• Maneuver through the air, pulling off insane stunts in your car or motorcycle to maximize your speed & find a fast route to the goal.

EXOTIC NEW LOCATIONS
• Over 40 high-speed tracks in 16 different settings, such as Venice, French Guiana, Iceland, the Nevada Desert & other exciting locations to ride your car or bike across!
• Race any track you want in original mode or its mirror variation to ensure a fresh challenge in Career mode that’s sure to keep you on your toes.
• Discover plenty of shortcuts hidden throughout every location. Mastering them is sure to raise your game to the top of the competition!

AN ENDLESS STREAM OF CONTENT FOR SPEED FREAKS!
• 9 seasons & over 400 events in Career mode, with plenty of challenges for even the most experienced car & motorcycle riders.
• Stunning visuals thanks to next-gen shaders, real-time geometry reflection & other amazing HD effects.
• Check out the Infected & Gate Drift modes for a fresh twist on racing.
• Win top prizes in the Limited-Time Cups, including early access to some of the latest cars in the game!
• A detailed damage system.

THE ULTIMATE MULTIPLAYER RACING EXPERIENCE!
• Gear up for simultaneous multiplayer action for up to 8 real players!
• Multiplayer Seasons & Leagues! Race your best against other players to score points & unlock prizes in limited-time Racing Seasons.
• Dare friends to asynchronous races as you chase your rivals’ ghost cars & bikes across the track.
• Compare scores on the new leaderboards with friends & rival riders around the world.
• Share your racing achievements & prove that you’re the ultimate speed machine.

MUSIC TO REV YOUR SOUL
• A heart-thumping mix of amazing music licensed for Asphalt 8 to drive your need for fast arcade racing.

CONTROL CUSTOMIZATION
• Rearrange your on-screen icons & controls however you like to customize & optimize your style of play.

So, are you ready for a real HD stunt-racing experience? Can you handle the Ferrari, Mercedes, or Audi of your dreams, among dozens of high-octane motorcycles? Do you have an insatiable need for groundbreaking speed? Well, consider this your green light to go & download Asphalt 8, fast!

descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above

comments: I Would Give It Five Stars...but...you should make it customizable for the colors you want to cycle through as you stack higher. THIS GAME IS NOT COLOR BLIND FRIENDLY. Great Idea Though, Nice Hand Eye Coordination Exercise. (I see Black and White, so a monochrome setting would be nice. Other people see colors differently as well) Needs A Color Cycle Customizer, or a set of different options for each type of Color Blind. Thanks in advance

I LOVE THIS GAME This is good game design. It rewards you no matter how high you go with a beautiful little tower. The colors are really satisfying. It keeps me engaged since you can "regrow" your blocks. That creates tension too--something to strive for. It's so simple but soothing and really addictive!!

A Great Game For When You're Dumpin'. I decided to install it because I ran out of YouTube videos while droppin' a duce. I really enjoy and will be using it the next time I'm in here as well. The ads are there, but they aren't too bad and there is an option to remove them for a small fee as well (which I plan to do.) My time in the bathroom has flew by because of the game and I'm happy to say that. I don't like to stay too long. Great game!

So,  basically it's a pretty fun app to play when you're bored. It's a great time killer, and is very challenging, but at the same time easy! It's a perfect app! I remember I downloaded this, and then I uninstalled it because I needed other apps on my phone. And now I installed it again, so then I have a fun game to play. I don't really have any games on my phone, so this is the perfect one. The inventors are genius! Five stars!!

Challenging and aesthetically pleasing A well made, minimalist stacking game which takes a long time to master, with nice simple visuals, a satisfying game mechanic and good sound effects. The instant replayability makes for a good competitive game amongst friends. The only reason it doesn't have a 5* is because I feel more could have been added to it, and done with the mechanic.

Good, with a major flaw I've ran into an issue that occurs about 1 out of every 3 rounds, where I'll tap, and the game won't register the trap until well after the position I wanted. For a game based on timing and your ability to stack moving blocks, when you tap is important, and needs to be 100% reliable. I'm on a Nexus 6P, very new phone with excellent hardware. I've closed all background apps, to try and troubleshoot. It's an issue I'd like to see fixed.

comments: Game is fun until you get so far and can no longer upgrade to compete.  I have all stars in amateur league, yet on achievement rewards it shows I only have 1 star.  This is a problem to try to earn stars to purchase higher end cars, you can't without spending money.  Should be anle to earn all cars if you play regularly withput spending money.

First up the images used as what the game looks like are fakes. I saw too many polygons.... (Shudder) Secondly there is no start menu. NOPE! Just some fancy loading screen and boom you're in the game without a chance to look at the controls. Plus your first mission is ruined by the tutorial at the worst places on the track.   Bad game knockoff. If you download this just delete it. This game is [EXPLICATIVE]

Nice game at first, my gf got angry at some point because I played it the whole time. However, I soon started playing less and less, because winning just became impossible. I respect the developers, but I wont pay to max out a cars modifications just to race that same car which is twice as fast. How does that work? Are the AI cars getting modifications from a different game?

Update: so I've been playing for several weeks now. You cannot win with maxed out mods, racing the same level cars. They're twice as fast and you can only knock off 3 cars at the beginning of the race and you're unable to catch with others. Even if you spend money, you will not get 1st place in a lot of the races. Very unbalanced game. Whoever programmed the ai should be fired  Fun game, but the intrusive ads are ridiculous. It pops up in the middle of a race, before and after the race, finished off by asking you to pay to remove ads.

The controls is very floaty like your car is late responding when tilted and i really like that this game is very fun and time wasting but it lacks car selection very small but i know it will add soon. And i thought the pic is real but it is not even the same on the game for its originality that all thanks

People have low requirements nowadays. This game doesn't deserve a 4.4 rating. It feels good as long as I stay in the menu (even with the weird japanese mascot) but once the game loads it gets horrible. The camera angles are terrible, the cars feel like toys in the overscaled world, the car's softshadow is terribly aligned and the physics simulation is just mediocre. The whole game is just a mediocre clone of Asphalt 8, I don't understand why people choose an inferior copy instead of the original one...

comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

Great game but some levels really hard I cant pasd this one level im on for days maybe update make it easier pass level I'm on I just did update...I hope so... love game anyways great game to.. identical cooking joy to map was a great game to but also hard get passed certain levels that game to n I can try play fast with my hands to still cant pass to not playing  cooking joy anymore going stick with this one see if game gets easier to

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. 👍

comments: It needs an option to turn the sound off independently. I don't want to have to constantly turn my media volume level up and down every time I begin or end playing the game. Sometimes two ads in a row before you can get back to the game. Otherwise it is a satisfying games to play.

I really like it. Has your mind thinking. I like the fact that after awhile if you don't get the word it helps you out without having to use the hint option. Even my 9 year old likes it.. he plays it with me sometimes

Great game to pass the time away. My only gripe is the daily challenges, the timings don't really work for me so I often miss the morning ones. Would be better if it went midnight to mid-day and then mid-day to midnight.

It's not very challenging like some of the other word games I've played. I was at level 50 in a matter of mins. To me anyway thats way too easy. My 4 yr old granddaughter could probably play this game with ease

Good game. Does have alot of adverts u can claim coins so far on level i am at. Played b4 a while ago and i could only claim 4 times coins for over 24 hours. Maybe once u get to certain level u can only purchase coins. But generally good game. Still  good game thank you.

My sister introduced me to this game and I am addicted!!!!!!. I find it challenging And like that they will give you a hint so that you can clear that level and be able to move on. Thanks for the mind challenge

comments: PAID VERSION NOT AD FREE! Got sick of the ads in this game cutting off the audio from my podcast in the background, so I bought the PAID version.  Big Mistake!  Fewer ads but they are *much* longer and they can't be skipped or stopped.  I plan to get a refund on this deceptive app!

The game is fun and addictive, and it also has a lot of content but unfortunately there's a bug that hasn't been fixed which is the time. Sometimes on many occasions, the level starts with the time passed like 1-3 minutes. Say I want to get 3 stars in a level by finishing it under 2 minutes and 30 seconds. When I start it, immediately one minute and a half are past without me doing anything and I have to restart the level to get it to zero. Sometimes I forget and end up finishing the level with 2 stars because of that bug and having to restart the level once again. I appreciate your support and offering the game for free but don't forget to get a fix for this bug, please. Thanks 🌹

I enjoyed that it is challenging but still easy enough to feel like it's not impossible. However, there is at least one ad before every level, and sometimes 2-3 ads will come up for each level and this will probably be the reason I end up deleting it.

Fun addictive love it the music the side effects all of it even my six year old daughter likes this game it's fun it's challenging for her it's not your typical solitaire and she's only 6 years old and already she loves it the higher the level the more she said Love's to figure it out great game wonderful brain game for small children teaching strategies great job guys two thumbs way up

Impossible to enjoy game play due to excessively intrusive advertising.  One can't even shuffle without being forced to watch another ad. Banner ads, long boring ads between each level, jammed into players brains (so the developers wish).  I am immune to advertising and simply tune it all out. My only reaction being to UNINSTALL this otherwise enjoyable game and warn others about it's predatory intent.
You get an ad between every game, but its not annoying for me. They're easy to skip. They gotta make money somehow, right? Other than that, the game is really neat and fun to play.

comments: The only problem I have with this game is that, if you have brought everything out of each of your stores and still have coins available WHY CAN'T WE USE OUR LEFT OVER COINS AND BUYS SPOONS? Cause you can't do nothing with left over coins in each state. Other than that, it keeps me ready for any challenge.

I absolutely loved it compared to the other games because it's absolutely free with literally thousands of levels and different menus (so you don't get bored)... It's a great balanced of easy and challenging (but still achieveable without spending a single cent)... My only complaint is that every now and then it hangs (but that's quite rare)... Great job!

The game is fun when it works. Every time I unlock a new restaurant or a new region or bonus level or ANYTHING it won't download. I get a "connection error", and the only way to get past it is to delete the game, re-download EVERYTHING (which clocks in at over 100mb) and try again. Update 3/15: I emailed the devs over a month ago and have yet to get even an automated response.

After all changes in Dublin its n impossible to win levels without purchasing spoons and boosts. It was a great game but it slowly got ruined by the greedy developres i guess. Well..guess what! I am not spending a dime on it and I will just stop play it.

This game is fun, but it would be much better if they make it so that you can watch video ads so that you can get more spoons, boots, and lives. You can only watch a video once or twice for a life. I definitely won't spend my actual money to play this game. It's not a home counsel game.  Also, this game gets difficult quickly. I'm in the Paris level and barely making it through. I like to play this game for fun and to pass time. But the difficulty increases makes it not as fun.

I love this game but the fact that you can't use coins to buy spoons really annoys me. I wish they at least had an option to convert coins to different currency so that you can buy stuff in the next locations. What are you meant to do with your coins after you've finished the city?? It's such a waste.

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Too much pay to win, free players hardly getting anywhere in the events and so fourth, not fair, increase the rewards of spending money and give free players more too easily solved, I previously rated it 5 stars instantly loved it but as I've progressed it's just not fair!! Please do something!! I am vip6 but I'm not rich, please bring more rewards for loyal free users who watch the ads and everything!! Thank you!!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

There is certainly alot to do, but is there really much to DO do? I've just been continually tapping red dots and getting free prizes, which (although nice) doesn't feel like I'm especially earning anything, you know?  Feels like a game that will keep you occupied for maybe months, but a year after you delete it will you really REMEMBER it? Probably not.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

descriptionHTML:
"Android Excellence Game" of Google Play. Play with 12 million global players!
Join millions of other players around the world and start your journey from Sara Forest to the High Heaven, leading your band of heroes into ancient ruins to battle the forces of darkness!

GAME FEATURES:

★IDLE System★
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

★Evolving Strategy★
More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

★TONS of Content★
With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, heroic quests, mysterious towers, arena, guild, much fun to enjoy!

★GUILD Wars★
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent. Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

comments: Someone needs to be fired or at least schooled on currency exchange rates. They offer 2 packs for 5 and 20 then except for rare sales which offer 49 and 79 dollar packs everything is 100 dollars google should step in and pull this game off the google play market for a square enix licensed product they have enough backing to have actual microtransactions not be a game exclusive to rich people who use 100 dollar bills as toilet paper...

I started this game when it first came out. There were hardly any game advantages and everyone was having fun and on the same playing field. As more and more packages got released into the game it became a pay to win situation. I personally do not think spending $100+ on a phone game is a wise investment. Thus I enjoyed the game by taking advantage of their events and the prizes within the game. However, it has become dominated by people who payed to be the big guy and the little people get absolutely demolished. It has taken the fun out of playing, which really dissapoints me as it was a fun game to play.

This game has potential to be fun but it's completely ruined because IT'S COMPLETELY PAY-TO-WIN which sucked the fun out of the game that I quit. Don't get me wrong, Final Fantasy is highly respected RPG franchise because it's full of great games in the series. But no this one.  However, I might come back if the game developers make it not as pay-to-win as it is now. Right now, it's a complete money bucket!

This game is great and fun, I love spending my time playing this game. One problem though, what is going on with the packages? Why is it every time a package is bought all the packages go from 20 to 100 dollars ? We should be able to buy the 20 dollar packages more than once! Is that fixable? Please cuz i do want to keep playing but 100 dollars is too much.

The game is very addictive and fun to play. Some of the people playing the game are wonderful and fun to game with. Graphics are very good for a on line game played on phone, tablet or computer. The quests are challenging at best. BUT!!! BE WARNED... This game is not for young children as there is explicit language and cut throat people playing the game. After all it is a war game and nothing more. Now down to the nitty-gritty of the game. Yes it's free, but that only get you so far before you will need to buy packs in the game to advance and unlock the two new characters. The game quests are designed for people to spend if you want to get ahead fast. Large amounts of  $$$$$$ Cash are needed to play this game. $$$$$$ Personal note, I know people who have spent thousands on this game. Over all the game is great for young adults on up. PG-15

I absolutely LOVE my guild!!! Everyone is so cool,from all over the States & all over the world...have friends in other guilds as well from all over the world...my guild is like my "family"...some of us have even talked about meeting up with each other...I hope to finally meet some of my favorite people,especially our guild leader...we're like the best of friends!!! Although,he lives in TX & I'm from Michigan,we're both married ,but there's nothing I wouldn't do for him!!! Thanks so much for giving me this opportunity to meet such wonderful people!! Lifelong friends/family!!! 💜
description: Alexis Ren is waiting for you! Join the adventure! Be the hero of your own Final Fantasy XV adventure in the brand new mobile strategy game Final Fantasy XV: A New Empire! Build your own kingdom, discover powerful magic, and dominate the realm alongside all of your friends! Fight fire with magic to defend friends and defeat foes alongside millions of players from around the world! comments: It's a nice game, with a great graphics and such but the auto-update for extra files it's kind of annoying. Is there anyway to turn it off? Because we have to waiting for it to be downloaded before can play again. Can we choose to update whenever we want?  Anyway, this is a really nice game and I've been playing it for a long time. Keep up the good work!

I love the game. There's nothing wrong with it because I feel like it's the old game that I grew up with. But what I hate is that the prices for packs, lp, sp and simoleons went high. The prices before was okay but now I don't think I will spend anymore for packs that give only like 5vip points. Such a fun game but aimes for large microtransactions.

I really enjoy this game, and love developing my Sim's homes and the world. Unfortunately, my game won't open. It hasn't for about a month now, even after this new update. It shows me the loading screen for five minutes, then crashes. It would be wonderful if there could be a fix for this.

Love love love it! This game is actually better than The Sims Mobile... 2 problems,, 1st. The Modern houses with second floor, so expensive😭! 2nd. The time it sometimes takes ages just for one activity!😐 but hey, everything else.. TOTALY AWSOME! 😍 thanks so much for creating this game. Cuz its so hard to download the sims 4 in a Mobile. 💕

This is actually cool and I really love this game. However, the expiration of most of the quest that i'm having are only 2 days to finish. I think it's unfair, and the materials needed are too expensive. Sims are busy on finishing tasks so they won't be able to go to work and earn. So I'm not totally enjoying the game.

When you get an event sometimes it only lasts for like 2 days which really isn't enough because some actions take 1 day. Please extend event times and don't give like 5 events at the same time. Also you should be able to log in other ways apart from Facebook because lots of people don't have Facebook. Please make other ways for us to login  so we can get more neighbours.
